topic.title: ACCESSIBLE INFORMATION SPECIFIC INFORMATION FORMAT CODE (SNOMED CT)
topic.shortdesc: ACCESSIBLE INFORMATION SPECIFIC INFORMATION FORMAT CODE (SNOMED CT) is the SNOMED CT® concept ID which is used to identify that the PATIENT requires information in a specific format.
